item.description:
Join members of this meetup and the other meetups in the state as we come together to celebrate this holiday season.

6 - 9 PM Networking, Door Prizes, Appetizers, Cash Bar
9 -12 AM Buffet, Special Guest, Live Band, Guest DJ

General Admission $10
RSVP by emailing info@blackinct.com

Reduced Admissoin $5
(With Canned Food/Non Perishable Food Donation)


Join BlackinCT.com and The Urban Professionals Network (UPN) as we celebrate our 4 Yr. Anniversary. By hosting this years event at a centrally located venue of Connecticut, we are looking forward to seeing friends & colleagues from all regions of Connecticut (Stamford, Hartford, New Haven, Danbury, New London, Meriden, Bridgeport, & Waterbury). Through the years, we have provided an upscale roster of diverse social & business events throughout Connecticut. This year we celebrate in the Hartford region at one of Connecticut's most storied venues. The historical Trinity-on-Main Theatre, with magnificent stain glass windows, and Old World charm. Celebrate the holiday season in style with Urban Professionals from across Connecticut and Western Massachusetts. Your best Holiday Attire Recommended
item.name: The 2009 Holiday Mixer & Food Drive
